config: We held our second Ghoulie Awards! As a returning Justia event, we were very excited to see all the fantastic and spooktacular costumes. We want to thank everyone for participating and submitting your costume for consideration in this year’s edition, and we are already looking forward to next year’s event with great participation, enthusiasm, and creativity! Without further ado, here are our winners for each category!

left.first: Squid Girls - Claudia Duque, Ana Espinoza, Griselda Santos, Laura Garcia, Valeria Dimas
left.second: Who is that Pokemon? - Jose Soto, Karla Rodriguez, Carolina Leija, Andrea Cervantes

right.category: What the Heck Are You Supposed to Be:
